Articles.Content:
Hello everyone!

Multiplay technicians will be performing server maintenance on the forums, bug tracker, wiki, website and KSP store on Wednesday October 7th, between 7AM and 11AM UTC. During this maintenance the forums and other services will be temporarily unavailable.

Thank you for your attention

Edited October 2, 2015 by KasperVld

Nooooo!

Ah well, at least it doesn't last that long.
Please don't delete 6 months of data!
What is UTC?
UTC is the time from which all other time zones are derived, it's basically the same as Greenwich Mean Time.
Ok, thanks

UTC is the time from which all other time zones are derived, it's basically the same as Greenwich Mean Time.

But... but... UTC has leap seconds!
Thanks for the headsup. Even though it'll be in the early morning here in the US.
Phew! I'll be at work then........life without this forum would be....well....really really bad!

Oh my god! Did it really happen? Has an actual forum maintenance announcement really been made on the forum before twitter?

No seriously, this is how it should be done. On the forum and well in advance. Thank you for the heads up.

But... but... UTC has leap seconds!

Oh dear, leap seconds, what now...

Greets,

Jan

Oh dear, leap seconds, what now...

Greets,

Jan

Hello everyone!

Multiplay technicians will be performing server maintenance on the forums, bug tracker, wiki, website and KSP store on Wednesday October 7th, between 7AM and 11AM UTC. During this maintenance the forums and other services will be temporarily unavailable.

Thank you for your attention

NOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOO!

Phew! I'll be at work then........life without this forum would be....well....really really bad!

But, but... work is precisely where I need this forum the most!!

But then, I'll just be arriving at work when the server will be coming back. Thank Spode for the time zones

Oh dear, leap seconds, what now...

Greets,

Jan

What, you didn't know about that? It's definetely a thing!

Leap Seconds, Frog minutes, Toad Hours, Tadpole years.

You asked.

Now you made me laugh!
Lets hope the kraken stays asleep

I didn't know the KSP network was hosted by Multiplay.

Let's just hope it stays that way..
It'll be 5pm when it happens, oh well, I've got the morning
The server maintenance has been postponed. We'll let you know the new schedule when it becomes available

The server maintenance has been postponed. We'll let you know the new schedule when it becomes available

Wonder why? Any info on this?

Wonder why? Any info on this?

Have you ever tried to get an engineer to turn up on time? There's a strong tendency for them to get called away for more urgent work elsewhere, and all bookings are provisional on such happenings.

Have you ever tried to get an engineer to turn up on time? There's a strong tendency for them to get called away for more urgent work elsewhere, and all bookings are provisional on such happenings.

We've learned well from the plumbers

Wonder why? Any info on this?

They made an image of the current servers, and copied it to the new servers. When they compared the two there were some differences, so they'll have to make new images, transfer them again and then do the upgrade once everything is in order

They made an image of the current servers, and copied it to the new servers. When they compared the two there were some differences, so they'll have to make new images, transfer them again and then do the upgrade once everything is in order

Ok, that makes sense! Thanks for the info. Looking forward to seeing how the upgrades pan out!

They made an image of the current servers, and copied it to the new servers. When they compared the two there were some differences, so they'll have to make new images, transfer them again and then do the upgrade once everything is in order

Oh, so this is the long-foretold Forum Upgrade happening? I thought it was just another behind-the-scenes cleanup or whatever it is you guys do when the Forum gets temporarily shut down.

EDIT:

And aren't posts in this section usually "queued for moderator approval?" Because this one wasn't...

Edited October 8, 2015 by Starwhip

Oh, so this is the long-foretold Forum Upgrade happening? I thought it was just another behind-the-scenes cleanup or whatever it is you guys do when the Forum gets temporarily shut down.

EDIT:

And aren't posts in this section usually "queued for moderator approval?" Because this one wasn't...

What kind of upgrade would it be? I think this is just standard procedure to work on an image of the servers before applying it.
This is all related to simply upgrading server hardware.
